subdefinitions.definition: The perception of the movement of one's own body , its limbs and muscles etc.
A spectator's perception of the motion of a performer, or, the effect of the motion of a scene on the spectator.

definitions.definition: Proprioception or static position sense; the perception of the position and posture of the body; also, more broadly, including the motion of the body as well. See usage notes below.

secondary_definitions: Proprioception or static position sense; the perception of the position and posture of the body; also, more broadly, including the motion of the body as well. See usage notes below.
